title: unicode/norm: add support for normalization
body:
If Go receives utf-8 bytes from an external source it is possible that they may use a
different character to bytes mapping than that used internally by Go. This would lead to
surprising results (e.g., two strings comparing unequal because their bytes are
different even though their characters are the same).

One solution is to provide a normalization function so that if this problem arises
people can normalize externally received utf-8 bytes.

[PS This isn't a Defect or a Compiler bug -- it is a Suggestion; maybe there should be a
Suggestion Template?]
